Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are eagerly awaiting news about the upcoming Federal Budget and what measures will be taken to help Australians get through the ongoing pandemic's economic impact. Aiming to provide relief the government has announced that over 5 million households will receive up to $500 in power bill relief. However this aid has prompted concerns about inflation from Shadow Treasurer Angus Taylor. On the other hand a proposed $20 hike on the departure tax has raised alarm in the travel sector with many urging the government to avoid its implementation.
